items.content_html: Stateflow-lib is a lightweight React library for centralized global state management using the React Context API. It allows seamless state sharing across components without prop drilling, with custom hooks for accessing and updating the state. Fully TypeScript-supported for type safety and scalability.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for seamless API management. Apic simplifies API calls by providing automatic retries, intelligent caching, and robust error handling, so you can focus on building your application without worrying about the complexities of API interactions.
